meanings.sent1: Skydiving without a parachute is the riskiest thing you could do.
meanings.sent2: Climbing the tallest mountain is considered one of the riskiest adventures.
meanings.sent3: Eating a whole cake by yourself is the riskiest way to satisfy your sweet tooth.
meanings.sent4: Driving without a seatbelt is like playing the riskiest game with your safety.
meanings.sent5: Swimming with sharks is the riskiest activity for thrill-seekers.

meanings.definition: Most likely to involve danger or loss.
meanings.sent1: Investing all your money in one stock is the riskiest financial decision.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the deep ocean alone is one of the riskiest adventures you could embark on.
meanings.sent3: Wearing mismatched socks to a job interview is the riskiest fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: Trusting a stranger with your personal information is the riskiest move in the digital age.
meanings.sent5: Skipping breakfast before a marathon is the riskiest choice for an athlete.
